title: Howling Abyss Glitch / Hack ( Has link to Photo )
body:
[Photo](https://postimg.org/image/3mfhz562b/)

So me and my friend decided to have a 1v1 in the Howling Abyss map. Everything was normal but the shop was a little... odd. 
First of all, the items were not for the character that I was playing, and secondly, the fourth line of text doesn't even make sense. 
It says - "IF THE oTHER TEAM IS WINNING BADDLY AND U CANT WIN" 
I'm 101% sure that Riot doesn't write like that. Looks like a 10 year old wrote that!

So what do you guys think? Is this because a fault in the system or is this a hacker? 
This wasn't game changing or anything like that, but I really want to know what this is. ( It's kinda funny too )
So is there anything you guys know? Thanks!

replies.body:
Hi! 

As S2K Delirious had stated, this is a custom item set, and not something that's broken in terms of the game itself. 

You can find your custom item sets by going to your profile, and clicking on Item Sets at the top. You should be able to find what you're seeing there. :) If you didn't set it yourself, and think someone else may have access to your account, please change your password immediately.
I don't remember adding anything so someone might have access to my account. I will change my password immediately. Thank you so much for the reply!
You're welcome! Lemme know if you need anything else!
I'm pretty sure that used to be the case, but there was an update at one point so now everything is saved server side.

Support site saved the day! https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752904-Item-Sets-#h5q1

> DOES THIS SAVE TO MY ACCOUNT?
> Yes! Item sets are saved server-side as of Patch 5.23, so they will travel with you no matter what computer you use.

Those property files are probably just leftovers from before 5.23 :)

Mmmm. You may be right. I'm not entirely how the system works, but from the screenshot, it's certainly a custom item set. ;_; It's possible someone may have logged onto his computer and made the changes.

Its a custom item set which u or someone has made on ur account..
Switch it back to recommended in the drop down while playing/ delete that item set .
Thanks for the reply! The reason I thought this was hacking was because I didn't add anything... Anyways thanks for answering.
